text: manager-howto mentions zero-length string for root context path instead of "/"

creator: sbailliez@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 11485
Use "/" instead of zero-length string for ROOT context

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
Fixed in CVS for 4.1.x and 5.5.x
